ygData.subject: Re: The end of unfair pricing!
ygData.msgSnippet: I was talking to a player who sold me a pair of banded wristbands (or whatever they re called) for 4 plat a piece (raw mat l is 2.5 plat on 100% success I
ygData.messageBody:
I was talking to a player who sold me a pair of banded wristbands (or
whatever they're called) for 4 plat a piece (raw mat'l is 2.5 plat on 100%
success I think). When I asked what his smithing skill was he said around
84. He was just to the point where he could make the wristbands and mantles
fairly easily (I'm guessing +40% chance of success) and he said his friends
sunk more than 500 plat into the skill.

Now that's a bit sobering...

Good Journey,

Sineras (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: Rodney Morris [mailto:rodmorris@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 9:16 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: The end of unfair pricing!


From: Rodney Morris <rodmorris@...>



[snip]
What goes through a smith's mind when they sell a banded helm for 10pp?
That is cost, assuming a 30% success rate (which I believe requires
a skill level requiring an investment of HUNDREDS of platinum).
[snip]

OK, time for my medicine now. 8)

Rod
